public QualificationDTO getOneQualification​(@PathVariable

        Returns 404 if qualification not found.

        Returns:
        qualification representation model

      • getAllCompetencies

        @GetMapping("/{forQualificationCode}/competencies")
public org.springframework.hateoas.CollectionModel<CompetencyForQualification> getAllCompetencies​(@PathVariable
                                                                                                  java.lang.String forQualificationCode)
        Retrieves all competencies for a particular qualification.

        Returns 404 if qualification has no competencies.

        Parameters:
        forQualificationCode - qualification's code
        Returns:
        list of all competencies for a particular qualification

      • getOneCompetency

        @GetMapping("/{forQualificationCode}/competencies/{competencyTafeCode}")
public CompetencyForQualification getOneCompetency​(@PathVariable
                                                   java.lang.String forQualificationCode,
                                                   @PathVariable
                                                   java.lang.String competencyTafeCode)
        Retrieves a particular competency with related to the qualification data.

        Returns 404 if no proper competency found.

        Parameters:
        forQualificationCode - qualification code
        competencyTafeCode - TAFE competency code
        Returns:
        competency with related to the qualification data

      • getAllSubjects

        @GetMapping("/{forQualificationCode}/subjects")
public org.springframework.hateoas.CollectionModel<SubjectForQualification> getAllSubjects​(@PathVariable
                                                                                           java.lang.String forQualificationCode)
        Retrieves subjects for a particular qualification with related data.

        Returns 404 if qualification not found or it doesn't have any subjects.

        Parameters:
        forQualificationCode - qualification code
        Returns:
        list of subjects for a particular qualification with related data

      • getOneSubject

        @GetMapping("/{forQualificationCode}/subjects/{subjectCode}")
public SubjectForQualification getOneSubject​(@PathVariable
                                             java.lang.String forQualificationCode,
                                             @PathVariable
                                             java.lang.String subjectCode)
        Retrieves a particular subject for the qualification.

        Returns 404 if no related to qualification subject found

        Parameters:
        forQualificationCode - qualification code
        subjectCode - subject code
        Returns:
        subject with related to the qualification data
